exceptions.tactic: exists ((l1 * g x - f x * l2) / (g x * g x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference l1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. unfold ex_derive. intros [l1 Hl1] [l2 Hl2] H4. exists ((l1 * g x - f x * l2) / (g x * g x)). apply is_derive_div. - apply is_derive_mult; auto. - apply is_derive_mult; auto. - apply H3.
